pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:0.4: The sub-chapter on sunshades and sandals
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.2: At that time the nuns from the group of six traveled in vehicles.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.4: “How can the nuns travel in a vehicle? They are just like householders who indulge in sensual pleasures.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.5: The nuns heard the complaints of those people.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.6: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.7: “How can the nuns from the group of six travel in a vehicle?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.8: “Is it true, monks, that those nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.11: How can the nuns from the group of six travel in a vehicle?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.12: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.13: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.14: ‘If a nun travels in a vehicle, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.15: In this way the Master laid down this training rule for the nuns.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.2.1: At one time there was a sick nun, and she was not able to travel on foot. …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.2.3: “Monks, I allow a sick nun to use a vehicle.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.2.4: And so, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.2.5: ‘If a nun who is not sick travels in a vehicle, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.1.6: who is able to travel on foot.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.1.8: who is unable to travel on foot.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.1.10: a wagon, a carriage, a cart, a chariot, a palanquin, a litter.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.1.12: if she travels in a vehicle even once, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.2.1: If she is not sick, and she does not perceive herself as sick, and she travels in a vehicle, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.2.2: If she is not sick, but she is unsure of it, and she travels in a vehicle, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.2.3: If she is not sick, but she perceives herself as sick, and she travels in a vehicle, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.2.4: If she is sick, but she does not perceive herself as sick, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.2.5: If she is sick, but she is unsure if she is, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.2.6: If she is sick, and she perceives herself as sick, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.3.5: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.3.6: The second training rule is finished.
